text: is a Sōtō Zen temple in Saga, Saga Prefecture, Japan. It was the bodaiji or family temple of the Ryūzōji and Nabeshima clans, many of whom are buried in its grounds. ==See also== * Saga Prefectural Museum ==References== ==External links== * Kōden-ji Category:Buddhist temples in Saga Prefecture Category:Saga (city) Category:Nabeshima clan
title: Kōden-ji
